name: WHAT?! (itch)
description:
"A body has just hit the ground!"

A team of investigators in suits screamed past Mr. Private Investigator, picking up the debris of the mess. 

"Yep, that's Timothy Burke alright. It took a while to identify his body - or whatever remained of it."

"Get a move on everyone! I'm personally assigning this case to you, investigator I. Don't let me down."

I kicked open the door of the building to get inside...

____________________________________________________

What?! is an investigation game with comical, untraditional endings. The game contains different cases that require the player to take on the role of Mr. Private Investigator to explore the crime scene, interact with clues, and ultimately solve the classic whodunit question.

* This is a four-week prototype inspired by the 1- bit 'dither-punk' aesthetic of early pixel graphics. The game takes on the detective fiction subgenre and mashes together mystery and comedy to form our own take on comedy noir. There are currently two cases, with the second being recently added. We are aiming to expand this game in the future. Any feedback would be greatly appreciated. We hope you enjoy this passion project of ours! :)
